title: cheezcarls
author: cheezcarls
content: Source: https://bitpinas.com/business/coins-ph-hacked-12-million-xrp-the-block-report/Guys ano masasabi nyo sa latest issue na ito ng Coins PH?Matagal na din ako hindi gumamit ng Coins PH dahil most of my transactions nasa Binance P2P na. Nag deposit lang ako ng konte sa Coins PH para at least hindi tagged as inactive otherwise meron dormancy fee kagaya ng mga traditional banks at mobile banks.Grabe nangyari ata ito after nung nag pump si XRP dahil panalo sila sa case over SEC US.Possible ba totoong na hack talaga ang nangyari sa kanila? Or merong insider? Magaantay ako ng mga opinion o insight about sa latest hacking incident involving Coins PH.Maraming salamat in advance!

comments.author: DabsPoorVersion
comments.body: The same thread already been created https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5471110.0
